About Us: Our Mission

About Us:

Our Mission

About Our Company

Vision

Our vision is to become the leading Courier Company in Barbados, by providing the most reliable, safe and efficient service to our current and potential customers.

Mission statement

At Markev couriers, we are committed to providing our customers with the best same-day delivery service throughout Barbados. We seek to provide the most environmentally friendly, professional, prompt & courteous service from our team at competitive rates
